about.text: Commercial Engineer (U. de Concepci√≥n) and Diploma in Data Science (PUC). More than 4 years designing pipelines in Azure, Python, and Power BI for large companies like BHP, ENEL, and Security Bank.

specialization.title: Specialization
specialization.technologies: Azure Data Factory, Python, Power BI

bullets: Designed and implemented a parametric framework in Azure Data Factory for full/incremental transfers between more than 20 tables.
Automation of regulatory reports for ENEL (SEC), reducing delivery time from 3 days to 30 minutes.
Continuous support for analytical models at BHP sites (Los Colorados, Spence, Escondida) with weekly updates and predictive model re-training.
Migration of on-premise ETL to Azure: 15 documented and versioned pipelines.
PoC of Postman/REST ingestions to Data Lake Gen2.
